review: I have one in my bedroom, one in the living room. LOVE them! They boot up so fast when I turn my TV on, and it's so convenient with Netflix and YouTube!
author: Casey James Brown

review: Great device!! Excellent quality.  Hopefully more channels will be added.
author: Judy

review: So easy to set up and use. The video is flawless every time I've used the Chromecast. Rock on, Google!
author: JohnW626

review: Of course, the idea is the product, and the idea is great.
author: Mark Michaels

review: get one, you will love it
author: dotcom

review: Works great!  Makes any TV a "Smart TV" without having to buy a new set.
author: Perry Ruby

review: I spent $35 on this instead of spending more on buying a TV with wireless connectivity and totally worth it.
author: Houston
